attributes.title: Very Dangerous Do Not Attempt
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app I was told there would be things that would be wonderful to support our presidentâœ¨ but upon downloading it, I could not open any other apps!! I tried and tried to open them but a random balding mans face pop up on the icons instead.ğŸ˜¶ğŸ˜¢I was appalled and only after a very long and horrible visit to my therapist did I realize that was my presidents face. I got into my car to drive away from the pain of seeing his face but As i was checking my rear view mirror cuz âœŒï¸âœ¨safetyâœ¨âœŒï¸a black SUV bearing, â€trump 2020â€ pulled up behind me. at first I was completely supportive but then I remembered the appğŸ¤­  I was NOT having it. I swerved left and right and did donuts and U-turns (which are illegal im so bad omg) just to avoid this SUV!! I could not avoid it though, only until after I found a dark ally that I was able to lose the SUV. I was so relieved that I didn't even worry when a weird stranger walked up to me asking if I downloaded THE app. With no time to think I immediately replied with yes. The strange man brought me into his alley way tea shop --which was so good by the way he let me call him Danny and we even exchanged numbers- ANYWAYS- He and some of his friends invited me to a rally to protest against this appâœ¨âœŒï¸ which he derected. I was so dissapointed on mh president when i heard that during our protests he was bunkered in his whitehouse. I was so upset that i took danny and barron trump away to an island in iceland and we lived happily ever after with the best tea and the best roblox player ever
